channel.title: RuneEngine
channel.description:
[CENTER][B][size=25pt]RuneEngine[/size][/B][/CENTER]
[B][U]Developers:[/U][/B] Anime Dune Zachera Jaywalker Rsrules
[B][U]Compeleted:[/U][/B] World Listener Packets PacketHandler PacketWriter PacketReader BaseWeapon BaseArmor BaseItem BaseQuest BaseInterface Player Movement Weight Music Bar Security Chat 455 Client Npc's [B]RuneEngine is now runnable[/B] New protocol Items Objects Stats/Skills Randoms (some) Npc pathing! Mini-games Bonuses Music bar Combat Graphics Animations Shops Dialogues All free quests! Castle wars! Skill capes! 456 cache!! Music bar support
[I] RuneEngine is a new source created from scratch & coded in a totally different manner. It's a very powerful, clean yet complex source. Most of which is not from scratch, like at the moment playerHandler & client, once we finish up on the other classes they will be wiped & coded from scratch. The engine of the source is a C++ application compiled (world.class, listener.class, packetWriter.class, packetReader.class, packets.class, packetHandler,class) with natives, using a command line to compile the rest of the class's into the engine, keeping the server running beautifully.[/I]
[I]There's still talk over whether RuneEngine will be released for free. This is still a matter of discussing it thoroughly with the rest of the team.[/I]
~Dune

item.title: RuneEngine
item.dc:creator: @lothy Lothy
item.description:
@lothy wrote:

Firstly, the java guru award is given to Java programmers who post stuff in the moparisthebest section, provided what they make is good.

Secondly, Jaywalker is the only person on that list that I don’t see as an incompetent big mouth.

Thirdly, Winterlove’s source and all of these other sources are shit. Hate to be the one to tell you sweety but this won’t be any different. As for IP banning me from your unmade server, be my guest. I won’t be missing out on much, presuming this toy does get off the ground.

Finally, you should stop talking yourself up so much. I can tell you, from experience, that people who gloat about being oh so good are usually completely incapable.

Oh and as for your work: It’s messy, ugly, and doesn’t even follow conventions that most people learn from day one. Now be a good boy and don’t reply to this.

Read full topic

item.title: RuneEngine
item.dc:creator: @Budda Budda
item.description:
@Budda wrote:

[quote=“bennyballs, post:19, topic:103139”]Holy shit, Mopar is full of sooo many fucking nubz, you can all go die, you dont know me, cause you hang out this nub infested site, srry moparisthebest, but man, your site is NUB INFESTED

Lothy, just because i hate you so much , cause ur a complete moron, im gonna IP bann you, from rune-engine, just so you cant ever play it when it comes out…

I really dont care if yall dont believe that this is true, but you are really all idiots, because if you new some of the best java coders, you wud see them in that Dev team ^

Anime = Person who created RSemu , - the first RS Emulator, I.e: P-server… (Was made 3 months before winterlove source)

RsRules = Awsomely Uber coder, from way way back… , and is a very famous person…

Dune = Me, very good java coder/C++ coder , and very famous on most sites, obviously not this one…

JayWalker = Person who is very good at C++ , and is headin towards making the first C++ Server

Zachera = Good at ClientSide work, Ex-Admin of Rune-server …

^ Now if you think that these people are all nubz, and suck at coding, then yes, we must be lieing and we are not making this server…[/quote]

There is no use trying to tell these people. 80% don’t even know Winterlove.

P.S. <3
